name: Lifeforce Deathrun
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 39! Whoa!

Both of you are running out of power! Run as fast as you can to get those sweet, life-giving batteries. But watch out! If either of you collect the wrong colored battery, you both explode! KA-BOOM!

Get the source code here!

Follow me on Twitter and Tumblr for what's next!
